Package game.actions

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AttackAction
    Special Action for attacking other Actors.
    ChantAction
    Action for chanting.
    CraftWeaponAction
    An action that crafts a Zombie Limb to a usable weapon
    FertilizeAction
    Action for fertilizing an unripe crop.
    HarvestAction
    Action for harvesting a ripen crop(food).
    HealAction
    Action for healing oneself.
    LoadGunAction
    An action that enables the Player to load a gun with ammunition
    QuitGameAction
    An action that allows the Player to quit the game anytime
    RifleSelectTargetAction
    An action that allows the Player to select a target in a sub menu when using rifle
    RifleShootAction
    Provides the rifle the ability to shoot a target
    SayAction
    An action for saying "Braaaaains"
    ShotgunDirectionAction
    An action that shows the available direction to shoot based on the position of the player
    ShotgunShootAction
    Provides the shotgun the ability to shoot an area
    SowAction
    Action for sowing a crop.
    TargetedAction
    An action that allows the Player to choose whether to shoot the target or to aim the target for one round This action will also be responsible of keeping track of the number of aims
    VanishAction
    Action for vanishing in air.
    ZombieAttackAction
    A special action used only by Zombie to attack a target
